article_title: Don’t Miss “The Tom Sullivan Show” This Weekend On The FOX BUSINESS NETWORK …
article_text:
THIS WEEKEND ON THE FOX BUSINESS NETWORK

A Government Shutdown? So What! David Stockman, Former Reagan Budget Chief tells us why a this shutdown is no reason to panic!

A Job Killer? Andrew Puzder, CEO of CKE Restaurants, on How Will Obamacare affect Fast Food Companies and employers?

Then, Jesse Ventura, Former MN Governor, Author of “They Killed Our President”, says the government and media are LYING about the JFK assassination!

PLUS: Author of “Beating Obamacare” Betsy McCaughey, Monica Crowley, Sally Kohn and Is Obamacare Electronic Data Secure?

TUNE IN TO “THE TOM SULLIVAN SHOW” THIS WEEKEND ON THE FOX BUSINESS NETWORK
